website_summaries.verdict: A great gaming monitor with a high refresh rate, although it doesn't always work well with Xbox systems.
pros: Refresh rate of up to 144 hertz
Features blue light shift mode for easier viewing
Offers both FPS and RTS gaming mode to up your gameplay
cons: Not a great choice with Xbox systems

customer_reviews.title: Only supports 120hz
customer_reviews.text: Ok the TV is not a true 144hz tv. It only supports 120hz on my xbox 1x and on my high end gaming pc. Not that the human eye can tell the difference but stop advertizing this at 144, it's 120! It does have good picture. Just fix the description to 120hz
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this monitor! It is a premium product with out the premium price! 180$?! It’s an absolute steal, the stand is solid, and the panel is flawless. Mine came with a display port cable as well as all the hardware and tools... yes I said tools! This thing comes with a freaking screw driver to assemble it with! Definitely buy one if you interested in 144hz gaming! (No this is not a paid review)
customer_reviews.author: Baylor

customer_reviews.title: Better than name brand
customer_reviews.text: I got this monitor after returning an MSI Optix monitor for the fact that it had so much flashlighting on the the edges all the way around that I couldn't even play anything on it. The price for this 144hz curved 1080p monitor is insane and while you may be afraid to try a lesser known brand, trust me it's fantastic. the blacks are darker and deeper than my benq and there is virtually no flashlighting issues. 144hz looks gorgeous and rts mode makes the picture really pop so i can see everything ( i play starcraft 2). Overall, great, no complaints, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chewy

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for 1080p 144hz and Curved
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all, I have mine running at 2k upscaled right now and it looks fantastic. I never thought that the whole FreeSync thing was a big deal but it makes a HUGE difference in games that don't always hit the 144hz mark, really smoothes out the image. As far as I'm concerned I'll definitely be buying another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price right when I plugged in the display port it came with I was off playing at 144hz with great picture monitor even has a tiny speaker but it’s not good what so ever so don’t buy this if you don’t have a speaker for your desktop when I turned it on the picture was pretty foggy compared to my 60 hz lg monitor but when I turned the pc to 144hz the colors looked better and it was smooth as butter for web browsing gaming and that 1ms response times is really great overall a good monitor
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product
customer_reviews.text: I think this monitor is fantastic for the price. It's hard to find something that's 1920x1080 AND 144hz for this price. The size is perfect for this resolution also. Very clear picture. Some were complaining about the colors being off but I think they look nice, perhaps a bit warmer than other monitors. There is one dead pixel towards the top of the screen, but its so small that it doesn't bother me at all. I hardly notice it unless im actively looking for it. Im very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great functions great, couldn't be more pleased for the money. Some reviews talked about dead pixels and cracked screens, but mine is in perfect condition and is true 144hz. One thing I will say, don't waste your time with the included screw driver. Kind of them to include it but get something a little heftier. Included DP cable works nicely though.
customer_reviews.author: dudetheCableGuy

customer_reviews.title: G-sync works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this monitor for 2 months and ive loved every minute of it, the picture quality is top notch, it arrived with no dead pixels. The audio quality of the speakers is nothing to write home about, id reccomend using headphones or plugging in other speakers. With the new nvidia update you can now use adaptive sync with this monitor and it has worked flawlessly for any game ive tried with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and for the price cant beat it. Love the first one ended up buying a second one. It does hit the 144hz and for the guy who said it didn't probably your display input can't reach that lvl especially if its older non gen 2 HDMI cables the dp cable included will get you to 144hz. Also it's not mention but they have speakers!!!!! Low quality but it's something!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cris o

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: It's worth it. Colors are great and even for a 24" 1080p monitor the screen is nice and crisp. The build quality is fantastic and the OSD makes more sense to me than any other I've used. I have only 1 complaint with this monitor but the price makes up for it which is why it's 5 stars still. Ghosting. Overdrive simply doesn't work and for me it made things worse. So there's some ghosting. Everything else is dang near perfect though. Again if the monitor was priced any higher than $180 I'd knock a star off. At this price point you can't do better.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Screen randomly goes black
customer_reviews.text: Updated to 1 star - the screen going black is happening more frequently, its become a worse and worse problem. Very Frustrating. Original post - Overall I like this monitor. But the screen will randomly go black for a couple of seconds from time to time. Its really weird. It happens infrequently enough that its not that big of a deal. But its still annoying. My connections are good, maybe its my settings??
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Let down, can't believe this...
customer_reviews.text: The box was torn apart on arrival, my heart dropped after seeing that because I knew the worst would happen. Set up the stand and the monitor and it had a white screen with lines. Biggest dent I've ever seen on a screen. Tried looking at the refund policy, have to wait to send it back before getting my money. Wish I could just have a working monitor instead of waiting a month just to get my money back and another one sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: MJBuys

customer_reviews.title: Was good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: After about 14 months this monitor failed and refuses to power up. We had bought two and swapped out the power supply but the broken one is still no good and the warranty is only for 12 months. Trying to get my money back through my credit cards extended warranty but this is disappointing after not that long of a time.
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: 1st time buying a gaming monitor this one is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described! I’m coming from an office monitor so this thing really unlocked my gaming! With free sync everything is so smooth! With anything you have to adjust the settings but once you get them right it’s vibrant and very well lit. It actually pretty big too passed my expectations! If you not looking to spend an arm and a leg for a gaming monitor I highly recommend going for this you will be very happy! The only con I have is the speakers sound absolutely terrible but I have a nice sound card a separate speakers so it’s not really a con for me. I recommend if you buy this buy your own speakers
customer_reviews.author: Rodrick

customer_reviews.title: 144 doesn’t work... but 120 does!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the monitor is nice! Being my first gaming monitor, I was excited to immediately unleash the frame rates that have been blocked by cheap small TVs that can only manage 60 FPS. I played around with the settings a little, and finally turned on a game to see if I could finally understand the glory that is 144hz. Basically to sum up my experience: It’s capped at 143 FPS, which is weird, so I just default everything to 120 FPS. Also, the screen flickers and it bugged me, but I got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hertzog

customer_reviews.title: PriceLord
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for price, comes with free screwdriver too for installation, so for works great
customer_reviews.author: Yan Z.

customer_reviews.title: THIS COMPUTER IS TOO FRAGILE FOR THE PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this computer for Christmas of last year, its always had a sort of flimsy screen with an alright picture quality. Recently as of about two days ago i tipped the monitor over by accident and it landed on my arm of my chair. I lifted it up and the inside of the computer was cracked and half of the computer pixels were dead. I've tried to find someone who can fix it anywhere but no one sells these kind of parts. So in conclusion i'm going to have to buy another monitor before i can play video games again. Not happy at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ridings

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a very good product. It is 1080p and actually can put out 144hz, my only complaint is where the mounting bracket is located. It’s at the bottom of the monitor whereas my other monitors bracket is in the center. So other than my monitors not lining up this is a pretty solid monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Screen stopped working after 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: When first plugged in I noticed screen flickering at the top center of the screen. It seemed to go away upon using. However, 2 days into using the monitor, the screen no longer showed a picture, just jumbled text. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Yumi Davis

customer_reviews.title: Broken item!
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged...not just one dead pixel....a large portion of the screen didn’t even work..the packaging was intact, it looked like it had been dropped or something prior to it being boxed up....working on returning the item now 😡😞
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Monitor for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This monitor offers the best bang-for-the-buck you can get on amazon. The picture is great and the refresh rate makes gameplay super smooth. Looks great and it easy to use. I would totally recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Rana

customer_reviews.title: Amazon service
customer_reviews.text: How hard could it be to find a "gaming monitor" as an Xmas present on December 21st? Locally? Impossible. Enter Amazon who had a wide selection of gold plated monitors out of my gift range, but yet this one was available for the right price and the correct hertz. The lad likes the curved screen and the device's ability to adapt to the viewing format he needed (don't ask, I'm not sure). Ordered on the 22nd at midnight and arrived on Xmas Eve afternoon as promised. Don't know long term how monitor will be, but Amazon service crushed it out of the park. Also found customer ratings helpful.
customer_reviews.author: John Lyford

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged, should've known better than to order from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this monitor for quite some time, decided I'd order another one two have a second screen. Arrived with the display damaged. Decided to write this review for the company itself, as I believe Amazon is responsible for the damage. The monitor is great for the money, amazing viewing angles and super smooth during use. The build quality is actually quite nice and it's surprisingly light. Try to buy this somewhere else to avoid getting it damaged like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Ghassan A

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, but..
customer_reviews.text: This monitor works really well. I don't see any dead pixels or any issues. However, when I turned on G-Sync on my RTX 2080, in some situations the monitor will flicker below 115 fps, I used CRU to fix the problem, and it appears to work properly now. Hopefully, I can get my 60-144hz range back in a future Nvidia update, but for now, I'm stuck at 115-144. I'm not sure if this is a monitor problem or a gsync-freesync compatibility problem.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor but..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this monitor and everything was fine. I sent the link to my boyfriend so he could buy a second one for us to have side by side. It wasn’t until we received his order that I realized the monitor I received is completely different. The stand is smaller and lighter in color. And there are much larger edges... the one he received is exactly like the picture. I’m honestly very upset, and I want the actual monitor I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Milianti

customer_reviews.title: Great budget monitor
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size this screen. I thought it was going to too small for my desk seeing how I switched from a 32 inch TV i was using. The picture is amazing especially for a a budget monitor. An you can barely notice the curve in the screen. The speakers are okay. Sounds like it's underwater but I usually have headphones on when gaming. I'm using a RX580 for a GPU and it's able to utilize the 144 hz refresh rate. You do have enable it in the settings and the free sync manually.
customer_reviews.author: gadget14

customer_reviews.title: Screen goes black
customer_reviews.text: The screen will go completely black. When I first boot up my system or start a game the screen will flash to black several times for anywhere for 1 second to about 20 seconds. Makes trying to do anything, especially play a game near impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H Price

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually know what to look for when looking at monitors but mi went to find one that has a 144 Hz refresh rate and found this one. compaired to the others that were a lot more expencive this one seemed great. the monitor looks and feels well made and the whole design is very minimal (which I like). the picture isn't outstanding but compared to my old monitor that was 60 Hz, this one feels smooth as butter. keeping in mind that you need a good computer to run most games these days on 144 fps, this monitor is great at keeping it budget-friendly. im considering buying another one for a duel moniter setup. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: josiah

customer_reviews.title: Screen broke
customer_reviews.text: I liked the monitor at first. Image was amazing and it had a sleek design. Problem is it is super fragile. I finished drinking a bottle of water set it on the table my cat came over smaked the empty bottle. The top hit the monitor and it black screened. An empty bottle of water broke the monitor. Going to try for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: marci choplosky

customer_reviews.title: At 2 months with just 3-4 hours daily use, I'm getting burn-in already!
customer_reviews.text: This was first powered on March 7th. It's now only May 17th and I can already see burn-in at the bottom of the display. The monitor is usually only on a few hours a day and is asleep the rest of the time. I suspect this thing isn't going to survive a year at this rate. Save your money and buy a more expensive competitor with a more resilient panel in it! The price on this is appealing and the monitor otherwise performs well...but the burn-in becomes noticable quick!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: downsides- mine came with 2 missing screws Upsides- full 144hz the guy who said it’s 120 is stupid mine had no dead pixels maybe shipping had a thing to do with it I don’t know. I had no hardware problems at all and the 144hz looks great Edit: broke after 2 months do not travel at all* I went on a easy 30 minute move and it got the far right of my monitor cracked when I basically did nothing trust me I’m not exaggerating please leave this in one spot. Edit:2 days after the crack the screen is completely black and will not make any kind of brightness yet speakers work.
customer_reviews.author: hudson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a huge vertical dent on the screen.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor on discount, hoping for a quality product to sustain CAD work, study, and gaming. However, I received the product with a huge vertical dent on the screen that makes it look like my iphone screen with all those bubbles. I initially thought it was a design for curved monitor since I never owned a curved one before, but when I turned it on, I realized the racked section wouldn't display anything. update 6/21: I am receiving a refund on the product once it is returned. Once I get the money, I will change the rating. update 7/31: Got my refund so 3 stars for the amazon customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last....
customer_reviews.text: I had this monitor and about one month EXACTLY after the warranty expired this monitor just stopped working... I wish Amazon/Sceptre would send me a new one because now I only have one monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Khoury

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: All around not a bad budget monitor, considering it's curved. A couple issues to note, my particular monitor does this thing where the whole screen goes black for about a second and then back to normal. Also I've had a bit of strange spazzing out but it doesnt happen too often, maybe once and hour or so. The speakers are absolutely trash but what do you expect. Overall decent if you're trying to save a little money
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C.

customer_reviews.title: as expected, more or less
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product for the price, i bought 2 Curved 24 inch 144hz scepter monitors. One of them sounds like one of the speakers are broken. But other than that. Its all good. Just beware of speaker issues. Also, when i was reading the info on the monitor. It didnt say anything about having a dvi port. But it did have everything that i expected it to. So make of that what you will
customer_reviews.author: scythe

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. No dead pixels. Pa el seems perfect. Out of the box it’s set to 60hz but changing that to 144hz and enabling freesync/ gsync and it’s amazing quality for the price . I noticed there seems to be two different models being sold one has the stand in the picture like tripod and the other is a flat style. I got the flash style
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for price
customer_reviews.text: Built-in speakers 144hz for this price not sure why this has no reviews but I will be the loner to say buy this monitor. Worth your buck.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: You could do worse.
customer_reviews.text: This is a monitor. It accepts input and displays it at up to 144 frames per second. It meets my needs and honestly it surprisingly okay for what I paid for it. There's minor ghosting, the backlight bleeds a bit when turned up above 50 (not terribly noticeable unless you have a plain black desktop like my boring self), and unsurprisingly the speakers suck.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Good gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased about a week ago and it came with no issues. The picture quality and brightness is great, but definitely could be better as I have had an Acer before this and that quality is better. The curved monitor set up is great for gaming, it does give a wider field. The 144Hz refresh rate is amazing, I saw an increase in fps in gaming and also great for video and streaming as well. I would highly recommend this upgrade for anybody with a 60 Hz monitor atm, just make sure to use the given DP cable and change your display settings to the refresh rate to get the new refresh rate :)
customer_reviews.author: Czarina

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality parts/picture for the price
customer_reviews.text: Screen looks great, runs as advertised at 144Hz, the base is sturdy and adjustable, and the install hardware actually came with a philips head screwdriver. What more could you ask for at that price? Just got it today so will update review if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: Nick Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken with a slight bump with no visible damage
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said she might have bump her water bottle against the lower left corner of the monitor, and it developed a black column on the right, and eventually have lines all over the monitor. First time I've seen a monitor this flimsy. Treat it with care if you must have this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Hiep Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Our 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this same one off ebay last month for his xbox 1. He wanted to try gaming on a PC screen. Now, My 17yr old son wanted one for his x box 1, because he liked my husbands. It's very good brand. The quality of the screen resolution is actually adjustable through the setting buttons on the PC. It's perfect. Not bad for the price. Except amazon had it for lower this time.
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: alright for what its for
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as my second monitor. The stand is extremely flimsy and unstable. The border of the screen seems to have some backlight bleeding (if not backlight bleeding, then some other form of light distortion). Works fine as a secondary display but I wouldn't want to have it as a main one. I wouldn't be surprised if there were better monitors on Amazon with a similar if not lower price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Came in the mail poorly packaged worked great for 2 days then had to pay 150 to have it repaired because the power board went out!!! I’d give zero stars if possible!!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd m

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, just a few regions of inconsistent brightness on solid black. Otherwise solid.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, just a few regions of inconsistent brightness on solid black. Unnoticeable during use, except for... solid black scenes. Quick, smooth refresh rate. The 'slower' ms is unnoticeable for me, far far outweighed by the fast refresh, brightness, and good colors. Update: monitor sporadically fails to report as a Plug-and-play monitor, reverting back to non PnP at 640/800@59hz. No additional features available, i.e. freesync.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Speakers aren't that great but the monitors pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Was getting 144 fps out of it, so it is a 144hz monitor but it also has a 3ms delay time. Picture quality isn't bad but the performance is pretty good when playing games. Speakers are horrible, the sound does come out but the quality makes it sound like some cheap ear phones. I had a PC speaker system and just ended up using that.
customer_reviews.author: Young K.

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap 144hz display!
customer_reviews.text: *hint: this is not good for Xbox One/ PS4.* This monitor is great for a cheap $170. It’s 1080p, and 144hz. Now, you could go and buy a $60 60hz display, but I assure that you must try it. For games that don’t take that much processing power, everyday use and more, this display looks great! Very easy to turn on 144hz and I find that I does have an impact on the experience. Games feel smoother, and I would recommend if you want a 144hz monitor. No flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Murray

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but sorta
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't be mad if i spent $100 on this monitor. I have noticed quite I bit of desync not great for gaming. Its not too bad but was hoping for a little more to include clarity/brightness. The speakers are pretty terrible but i expected that to be the case. If your computer is on the table next to your monitor, you will not be able to use without headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased due to price point, monitor was DOA. Powered on but received no inputs from PC. Swapped back to Asus monitor and worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon LaMora

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the monitor I have nothing bad to say about this monitor. I didn’t think a gaming monitor would make much of a difference in my skills but I went from average on COD MW to usually top 3 in most matches the 144hz refresh rate is amazing details on any game are cleaner. Just wish I spent a little more for a upgraded monitor that supports hdr and 4K so when I get my PS5 it’ll look even cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Oñate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value Monitor with Great Performance
customer_reviews.text: Monitor came exactly as described. Sleek design, beautiful display, and easy assembly with all parts conveniently packaged (assembly was so simple that the manual was unnecessary). Excellent monitor at an unbeatable price. Buttons on monitor are the best system I've seen, and the settings allow for excellent optimization and performance. I played Call of Duty: Black Ops 4 on it at 1920x1080 at 144hz with high texture settings and I had no problems whatsoever with blur, color errors, or screen tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these monitors now on each side of my 27 inch curved monitor and i purchased the second because i loved the first. Great quality for the price. For sure a good value. On board audio is terrible, but hey its a monitor not a real audio solution.
customer_reviews.author: bruce callahan

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased but didn’t set up right away. Finally got around to it, and the screen was broken. Ridiculous. Returned today, just waiting for my refund now. Loaded a game for pic to more easily see the issue. Dark windows background didn’t show well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: overall good - but the display port cable included doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Overall great price and deal, though the display port cable doesn't work for some reason. the screen will turn on then shut off at random while using the included cable. Not sure if its the port or the cable. I'm using an HDMI cable for now and works fine. if i could guarantee that the display port on the monitor isn't defective then i would give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Absolute rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in completely damaged box so of course when assembled there is a massive issue with the screen. Nevermind I waited almost a week for this whilst working 20 hour days from home on a tiny laptop screen whilst under quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Lifespan of a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Monitor worked well, and then I woke up and turned my pc on and it didn't. Display was alternating between black and flickering. Switched out cords, switched out from DP to HDMI, same problem. Hooked it up to another PC same problem. My willingness to ever buy anything associated with this company is going to depend heavily on how they fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Very good Monitor for both Mac & PC
customer_reviews.text: I need to adjust my settings a bit but it's been a great monitor so far. NO dead pixels yet, which was my biggest worry. I've had it for at least 2 months with no issues. Very crisp detail for gaming and every day tasks. I work in photoshop, premiere and switch between Mac and gaming PC without any issues. Looking into a dual monitor setup and this will probably be a double buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenessa Durrum

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Akward Stand with Cheap Fragile Screws
customer_reviews.text: About two weeks into using the monitor everything seemed fine until the small screws in the stand gave out and the monitor collapsed under its own weight. One of the screws had snapped internally and cause the stand to become unstable. It would fall over every now and then which was extremely annoying at first but eventually the monitor cracked after the stand giving out. I have the protection plan but it's extremely painful and difficult to use almost like they don't want you to repair or return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Monitor is defective...
customer_reviews.text: There is a tiny black dot on the screen, I put in a case but no one has responded for awhile now.....
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: No worries!!
customer_reviews.text: Was very worried about ordering a monitor online with all the shipping stories I’ve read,but I couldn’t find what I wanted anywhere around me. Monitor came in perfect condition and I’m loving it!! Followed someone’s recommendations for the settings on here and they seem good to me. This is my first nice monitor, and I’m glad I picked this one!
customer_reviews.author: Sour

customer_reviews.title: I need refund
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box ready to get my whole gaming setup made and it arrived like this I opened it less than 10 minutes before it came too. I handled with care... I want refund
customer_reviews.author: AVI

customer_reviews.title: Sceptre is a great Brand.
customer_reviews.text: Great colors, great sharpness, comes with a D-Port Cable, runs with no need for adjustments out of the box. Capable of 60hz, 120hz, 144hz refresh rates, though the higher rates maybe limited to HDMI/D-Port cables as per industry standard. Bonus - AMD Freesync feature for those that have the AMD GPUs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Expected longer life
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have expected something like this just a couple weeks after the "support window" expired.
customer_reviews.author: J Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this garbage
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely do NOT recommend this monitor for even casual gaming because of how unbelievably bad the ghosting experience is. There isn't really a reason for buying this monitor as if you are getting a 144hz monitor you're probably going to use it for gaming and that's impossible considering the abysmal ghosting. The picture quality is also pretty bad and the curvature of the monitor is laughably unnoticeable. I bought it because I saw it was on sale from 300 to 165 but that was just marketing and the monitor wouldn't even be worth 100 in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Such an Incredible Screen for the right price
customer_reviews.text: I gotten this screen about a month ago and its been incredibly great! It's super easy to install the table mount for the screen. I love the curve screen, it helps me such much instead of a flat screen because it makes you feel like you can see every single spec and it's way easier on my eyes. Plus I have it on a super small desk, and it almost's wraps around the desk! The 144Hz on the screen is also unbelievable great, I truly see the difference between 60Hz and 144Hz, it's super smooth. I would highly recommend my colleague's to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Davis C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Curved Monitor, Helps with Glare
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monitor because I wanted a 144hz monitor for gaming, but also I had some issues with glare since I have a window right behind me. It doesn't completely take out glare, but its noticeably different from a flat monitor. The price for a 144hz monitor was really good and its been holding well, no dead pixels.
customer_reviews.author: Jh

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor at an unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that no, this isn't a Samsung or an Asus in terms of screen quality and build. But this monitor at this price, curved and 144hz, is a deal too good to pass up on. I wanted a 144hz monitor, and when I saw that this was not only curved and VESA compatible, but way cheaper than any alternatives, I had to pull the trigger. This monitor will satisfy anyone looking to get a higher refresh rate monitor, and the viewing angles of the curved monitor are awesome. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitors!
customer_reviews.text: I must’ve hit the lottery. I bought two of these when they were 50% off. I received both with no problems and still none a couple weeks later. There’s a decent amount of reviews mentioning dead pixels and various other problems. I expected to have at least one monitor have some problem, but so far so good. This was my first time using a 144hz and curved monitor and I must say the difference is amazing. Definitely recommend these monitors, especially if they go on sale again.
customer_reviews.author: G2BY4

customer_reviews.title: Insane Overclocks!
customer_reviews.text: I was curious on overclocking, and I managed to get it to 240hz at 1080p, kind of crazy. I wasn't expecting it to reach that high. Note, I am using the display port connection, so I wouldn't try it with HDMI. Definitely worth the buy if you're going into competitive gaming. Amazing value and a huge upgrade from your typical 60hz monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Rondel Nabua

customer_reviews.title: Just needs some tweaks
customer_reviews.text: IMPORTANT NOTICE: at default it’s a 60 refresh rate. You have to go into advance display settings on windows to make this 144. Don’t get this for console gaming, doesn’t look right. However I hooked this up via the display cable to my new pc I just built and wow I’m amazed, free sync is super smooth, the graphics are way better, and overall just everything looks nicer. I do however have overdrive on which does help
customer_reviews.author: Jason Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought two so that I could have a 3 monitor setup, it is very sleek and looks great. The VESA mount on the back is a great addition. Very thin bezels on the sides as well so its good in combination with other monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Giles

customer_reviews.title: Good value, very minor complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Only complaints I have are that the stand that comes included is not exactly the best. Since the monitor is VESA compatible, I would highly recommend getting a VESA stand for a huge upgrade in adjustability. Another thing, although not even that big of a deal, is that the monitor has a decent blue-shift or maybe brightness-shift when either looking at the monitor from slightly below or slightly above.
customer_reviews.author: Jack W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with little to no expectations because it was my first curved monitor and it was for my laptop. I have a custom desctop build with better monitors, but doesn't discredit how well this monitor performs. It's worth the money for it's performance. Would recommend for anyone who is on a budget. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: GenVicious

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, attractive, and really good
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea how much a garbage monitor was holding me back. Once I got this, I could actively see the difference in crispness and beauty over regular monitors and reappropriated tvs. Was hesitant on the curve as well, but if anything I hardly ever noticed it while in use.
customer_reviews.author: Hirraed

customer_reviews.title: Great 144hz monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a multi use monitor. Xbox can only output 120hz but it still looks good and when I use it on my PC I get 144hz and it’s great. No issues no dead pixels no ghosting. Only problem I had was the screw pack was missing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Midrange Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these monitors, I got the first in late 2018 and the second a few months afterward. Even with the exact same settings the screens do/will not match in picture quality or brightness. The second monitor was nearly blinded me with the factory settings. From a quality standpoint the monitors are not the same, the black trim on each is a slightly different color one is more of a dark gunmetal gray the other is black. If you purchase one of these only get one monitor, it works well for games but if you are even a little bit ocd it is a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Tallon E. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not pictured correctly
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy overall with the monitor, but the main reason I bought it was to be able to run my older Mac mini and PS4 pro together. The monitor I got only came with one HDMI port, instead of the two pictured. Kinda disappointed but I’ll see what I can do about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The best monitor for my money. I wanted a curved screen gaming monitor and this bad boy has given me just that. Great picture, decent sound from the built in speakers. I have zero problems with the games that I play. Elder Scrolls Online, Smite, WoW, Tomb Raider, ect.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't like is that the buttons are on the back. Power button at least is easy to reach by reaching under. Works great for gaming; clear image, very fast, graphics are amazing. The curve is very nice. Gets kind of hot with extended use, but that's every monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, even better when it's on sale!
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for $150, great little monitor that I take traveling with me, colors aren't very vibrant, but TBH I bought it for the refresh rate anyways. This is my third Sceptre product I've bought and I'd have to say, besides audio, their products have never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Will4Real

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable for its price
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but after receiving it is well worth the $180 better than a $250 I used to have! If 144hz don't work at first go to your video card settings.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo Riofrio

customer_reviews.title: My first 144hz monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is my first 144hz monitor and i can tell you now that i will never go back to 60hz. the difference is night and day when using 60hz now, feels so laggy. It feels like this is how your pc is supposed run, so spend i would highly recommend getting this over another cheaper monitor even if you have to wait and save a little more.
customer_reviews.author: C6

customer_reviews.title: Affordable 144Hz Display
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a 75 Hz Acer display to this one and the difference in refresh rate is remarkable. Games are a lot smoother. Even the Windows UI looks great. I hooked up this monitor and just moved the cursor around my desktop for a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Not good for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Dead Pixel after a few months, Since it is curved there is bending at the bottom of the screen which is noticeable and ugly. The logo on the monitor is cheap too and comes off easily
customer_reviews.author: aldo

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandsons and they love the screen. I believe the picture quality is very good. It makes me consider buying a curved screen tv for the living room. My daughter has used this for gaming with her laptop and also likes it alot.
customer_reviews.author: P Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Would be amazing if there wasn’t 2 dead pixels within 2 days
customer_reviews.text: The customer service was simply amazing I do have to admit this first. However, the fact that i had to exchange a brand new never used monitor. I went with the 27 inch curved 185hz scepter monitor and have had that for 2 weeks. it’s absolutely astounding and no problems whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good for gaming
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this for online games like Fortnite, Minecraft, etc. He absolutely loves it. I thought the picture looked off when i first set it up, but i adjusted some resolution settings based on another reviewer's comments and it looks amazing. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t BUY CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Terrible set it all up did some schoolwork on it went to play with my cousins and I came back up to play video games and the monitor didn’t stay on and then the stand broke and it cracked the screen. Also the display port button broke and It took me 2 hours to get it out of my pc. I don’t know if it broke my gpu or not. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Great value, would recommend for price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, unbeatable. A small amount of light bleed in two spots, if you can it in to 4ths 2 of the 4 quadrants lines have small light bleed, but only on single color pages. I would recommend this all day.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Fast and fun
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor for almost EVERYTHING! As an avid gamer, it’s an affordable option to get into higher refresh rate monitors to give you that extra edge. The curve isn’t too exaggerated, but you definitely get all the benefit of the curved screen. Amazing picture quality and color too, depending on the PC build you’re working with. Overall, one of the best purchases I’ve made for my gaming set up!
customer_reviews.author: Eron Casson

customer_reviews.title: Read before buying
customer_reviews.text: First unboxing the monitor was fantastic. It felt sturdy and was way more thin than I had previously expected. The only thing that disappointed me was the buttons for the monitor controls are on the back of the monitor making it a pain to set anything up while you’re sitting in front of the screen. The stand was fantastic tho and felt really solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is pretty good for gaming, the fact that it’s curved for a reasonable price is pretty good for beginners, the only problem I found it is that the monitor moves a little bit out of place even though the screws are all the way in.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Medrano

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I am very very impressed with these monitors. I was a bit iffy about them due to some reviews on here but I went with my gut and I highly recommend these monitors. They are super smooth, 144hz works great! Pictures quality isnt 4k but the 1080p is more than great. Especially for gaming. I use them for gaming and 3D design. 10/10 from me. Ordered two to run a dual monitor setup.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3. Best monitors ever
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this monitor’s specs and then saw the price , I immediately thought that this monitor was gonna be trash. But I stand corrected. It’s an awesome monitor. The 144hertz is omg beautiful especially coming from a 60 hertz user. BUY IT!!! I bought 3
customer_reviews.author: Riley Green

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this monitor for a little over a month now. It is really good. The 144hz capability makes a large difference over 60hz and trying 60hz on my other monitor is absolutely horrible now. (You must remember to turn on 144hz in the settings to use this properly. No dead pixels, no complaints. Love this monitor, definitely worth a buy if you are looking for a budget 144hz curved gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier_Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: flickers and hotspots
customer_reviews.text: the screen flickers and there is hotspots on the monitor. i wouldn’t recommend it. if it didn’t have those two issues it would be a 4-5 star. i’ve seen other reviews like this so it’s not just my problem
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixel
customer_reviews.text: Received it with a dead pixel, other than that it’s an ok budget monitor, definitely better ones out there if you dint have to settle.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Best 144hz 24 inch, Vibrant, Smooth Motion
customer_reviews.text: Perfect packaging, quality is as expected. I watched videos like everyone else does before picking and went with this one. I’m happy I got it because the price went up a bit after I did, and everyone seems to want these now. Great buy, beautiful picture and motion.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Kopcsos

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor for gaming on pc. I think it’s a little too much for my ps4 though. The colors are a little blurry on ps4. I gave 4 stars because the logo on the monitor is starting to come off. I didn’t even touch it and part of the “e” is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Got this and instantly could tell a huge difference from my old 60hz monitor. No dead pixels and very fluid. Make sure you change your display settings and make sure that the refresh rate is on 144hz. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Coulter Proffer

product_meta.title: Sceptre C248B-144R 24-Inch Curved 144Hz Gaming Monitor AMD FreeSyncTM HDMI DisplayPort DVI, Metal Black 2018
product_meta.description: The Sceptre C248B-144R is a 24” full HD curved monitor that embraces all the speed and features that gamers crave. Featuring an incredible 144Hz refresh rate, fast moving visuals Pose no problem for the C248B-144R. For added competitive Edge, choose between FPS and RTS game modes to access custom settings that enhance gameplay. The brightness is 250 cd/m2
feature_bullets: 3ms Fast Response Time,ghosting and blurring are reduced so the user can enjoy the display with clarity and precision

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars954 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
